title: No Place for a Nervous Lady: Voices from the Australian bush
description: The harshness of the Australian frontier is brought into vivid detail with this collection of diaries and letters from women living in the Outback. Their inspiring accounts, framed by contextual and biographical commentary, unveil the rawness, solitude, and intensity of the pioneerâ€™s existence. Full of passion, pleasure, pain, and loss, this anthology will both captivate and demystify the stereotypical ideas of bush life.
author: Lucy Frost
